name: Paranormal Interactivity
description:
Paranormal Interactivity is a point-and-click adventure of ghastly proportions! The player takes control of a ghost and his psychic cohort as they work together to prevent an imminent danger from destroying their hometown.

CONTROLS

=====================================================

Mouse Click - Move Player

WASD - Move camera

Q,E - Rotate camera

Left Control - Have camera track player

  • Click on the ground to have the player move to that position
  • Click on objects highlighted in blue to have the player interact with them

HOW TO PLAY

=====================================================

The goal of the game is to find the four forbidden artifacts needed to seal the portal to Hell. The artifacts are scattered across the various locations of the game world, and the player will need to explore every nook and cranny if they plan to find them all. Be sure to chat with NPCs, too - they just might have a hint!

This game was created for the Devtober 2021 Jam. Although we were not able to complete the game, this build serves as a demo showing all we were able to accomplish over the course of development. We hope you enjoy, and please leave feedback to let us know what you would like to see come from this!
